alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Allen; Evangeline; Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 10:58AM CST until December 20 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Mermentau River Near Mermentau ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Nezpique Near Basile. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Minor agricultural flood damage will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CST Monday the stage was 22.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 AM CST Monday was 22.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 19.9 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Bayou Nezpique Basile 22.0 22.1 Mon 10 am CS 21.2 20.4 20.0 &&
